ssa-retirement-benefits-spouse.title: Retirement Benefits for Spouse
ssa-retirement-benefits-spouse.headline: Retirement Benefits for Spouse
ssa-retirement-benefits-spouse.summary: This benefit provides replacement income for qualified retirees and their families. Social Security is part of the retirement plan for almost every American worker.
ssa-retirement-benefits-spouse.criticalA: Only one application is needed to apply for all the benefits offered by SSA.
ssa-retirement-benefits-spouse.eligibili: You are at least 62 years old.
